subject: Junit 3.8: Maven build can't resolve TestCase.fail(message)
msgSnippet: I have a simple library, with some testers compiled with a maven [2.05] pom. Unit testing is performed with JUnit 3.8.1 [fairly standard so far] When
messageBody:
I have a simple library, with some testers compiled with a maven
[2.05] pom.

Unit testing is performed with JUnit 3.8.1 [fairly standard so far]

When compiling/testing/running from an IDE the unit tests compile and
run without problems.

When compiling from the command line [mvn clean package] the compile
stage of the build fails with

C:\src\SearchInterface\SearchCore\src\main\java\test\ecom\search\SearchBase.java:[209,12]
cannot resolve symbol
symbol : method fail (java.lang.String)
location: class test.ecom.search.SearchBase

SearchBase extends TestCase, and the fail(String) method has been in
the 3.8.x libraries for some time.

Could the JUnit jar posted to the maven repositories be invalid? [and
now off to the maven mailing list...]
